job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-10T10:18:47.000Z", "description": "

Machine Learning Engineer

We are a Boston-based MIT spinout that are pioneering within AI Acceleration, photonics, Machine Learning, and optics space. We are looking for a Machine Learning Engineer (Python, Mandarin, Deep Learning) to come and help solidify the hardware vision of what we are building.


As a Machine Learning Engineer, you must fluent in Mandarin, you should ideally have a background or knowledge of digital microarchitecture design, logic, simulation, AI acceleration, or general experience in the semiconductor industry. The ideal candidate will also have strong engineering skills with C++ or Python experience. The mandarin component is a necessity as you will be interfacing with their team that is in China.


We are in a period of rapid growth. This is an opportunity for an ML Engineer to join us at a relatively early stage and apply your skills in a brand-new area of technology that has never been attempted before. If you have experience You will be working on lower-level implementation of deep learning kernels, graph compilers, or training systems this may be the opportunity for you!


What we can offer:

  • An opportunity to work with our collaborative research team on novel work that will revolutionize modern-day computing as we know it.
  • A culture of openness and collaboration \u2013 we are all working together under a shared vision.
  • A great location in downtown Boston
  • Excellent benefits.


Key skills include: Machine Learning, Machine Learning Engineer, Software Engineer, Programmer, Programming, Engineering, Python, C++, Mandarin, Deep Learning, Deep Learning Kernels, Training Systems, Machine Learning Models, Algorithm Development, Artificial Intelligence
